all: PeopleSoft Upgrades for HCM CRM and FSCM applications

jd:
PeopleSoft Database Administrator DBA - Nukasani Group

About the Company

Nukasani Group is an E-Verified Company.

Job Overview

We have an urgent long-term contract project immediately available for PeopleSoft Database Administrator DBA.

Location and Work Arrangement

Jackson, MS

Key Responsibilities

  • Must have prior expert level technical experience with Peoplesoft as well as some functional experience supporting PeopleSoft Pension Administration System.
  • Perform all duties of upgrade including building demo, patching, initial test move, performance tuning, project planning, and all moves to production passes.
  • Perform all duties of the application migration including building all environments, patching, developing migration plan, performing migration, testing, issue resolution, and performance tuning.

Required Qualifications

  • Any level degree in Network Computing.
  • Experience as a PeopleSoft System Administrator / Database Administrator / Infrastructure design develop and deployment / Upgrade Specialist: 15+ years.
  • Experience specializing in large complex environments: 15+ years.
  • Experience with RDBMS operations on Oracle and MS SQL Server: 15+ years.
  • Infrastructure assessment: 15+ years.
  • Experience conducting an Oracle RAC upgrade, Oracle Database upgrade: 15+ years.
  • Knowledge of SCRUM: 8+ years.
  • Oracle Linux 7, Oracle Linux 8: 5+ years.
  • Oracle RDBMS 19c: 4+ years.
  • VMWare 6 and up: 4+ years.

Preferred Qualifications

  • VMWare, AWS, WebLogic, Tuxedo.
  • Preferred Certifications: Oracle Certified Professional, ITIL Foundation Certified, PeopleSoft 8.48 PeopleTools Installation Server Administration; PeopleTools Upgrade and Data Management; PeopleTools I and II Accelerated.

How to Apply

Please send your updated word resume and candidate submission format details immediately.
